Package danogl.components

Interface Component

All Known Implementing Classes:
RendererComponent, ScheduledTask, Transform, Transition
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface
public interface Component
Represents a function that should be executed in a GameObject in each update
Author:
Dan Nirel

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void update​(float deltaTime)
    When the a GameObject is assigned this component, it calls this method in every update

  • Method Details

    • update

      void update​(float deltaTime)
      When the a GameObject is assigned this component, it calls this method in every update
      Parameters:
      deltaTime - the time, in seconds, since the previous update
